title: >>> Frostbite FURY
body_text:
It's only fitting to begin with this quote ...
"I think I have frostbite!"
-
ROB AVAKIAN
"... 2, 1, Blast off!"
The 21-degree temperature met with an almost unbarrable wind chill forced the night to begin immediately. Participants did not want to wait for others to arrive. It was freakin' cold as hell!
To say that DODGEBALL 73 was a strange event would be an understatement. The "1/2" count-off was supposed to divide teams as evenly as possible. But things didn't exactly work out that way as Team 1 included a mere 5 players; Sara DeCuir, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Sascha Basista, John Tronolone, and Chris Adams. How and why the teams became so unmatched is still in question.
After a few trades, the action kicked-off as only it should; fast-paced, heart-pounding intense mayhem as only these teams of all-stars knew. The cold weather combined with rocket bulletballs inflicted much pain onto an enemy. How in the hell "Sputz" and "Fitz" were able to survive in shorts boggles the mind, and certainly questions their sanity. It just shows though the drive and passion of the game remains at all-time high.
The end result witnessed Team 2 defeat Team 1, with a score of 4 to 2.
Kevin Fitzpatrick (Team 1) and Mike Edwards (Team 2) may have stole the show at DODGEBALL 73. Both men outlasted many of their allies and certainly eliminated their share of competitors. Hats off to both men for all-around performances!
DODGEBALL 73 Records
> Attendance: 17
> Biggest Return:
(See Below)
*
> New Players: (1) Juan Londono
- There were no captains; a rarity in dodgeball. Instead, teams formed by a "1/2" count-off against the fence.
- There was no
Prison Ball
.
- DODGEBALL 73 featured both Human-rims and garbage cans.
- Thanks to Dan Spengeman and Rob Avakian, players were met with hot chocolate.
- Luke pulled through as always bringing plenty of pizza.
- DODGEBALL 73 was played on the one year anniversary of DODGEBALL 23.
- The event ended at around 9:45; an early ending.
- This was the first event in three weeks that was not taped.
- *Perhaps the most interesting piece of info is that every player that participated at DODGEBALL 73 were also in attendance for DODGEBALL 71 and/or DODGEBALL 72. There was no "Biggest Return".
DODGEBALL 74
This is a big one ladies and gentlemen. DODGEBALL 74 takes place one week before the Toms River Tournament. It was announced earlier this week that one ten-man team has formed for such an occasion. But it looks as if they have company. Check back for the story of this explosive tournament as well as the preview for DODGEBALL 74.
SCHEDULE
*
(Subject to Change)
*
DODGEBALL 74
Saturday, 01 . 27 . 07
6:30pm at Wall High School
> Toms River Tournament
Saturday, 02 . 03 . 07
5pm at Toms River High School East
DODGEBALL 75
Saturday, 02 . 10 . 07
6:30pm at Wall High School
DODGEBALL 76
Saturday, 02 . 17 . 07
6:30pm at Wall High School
DODGEBALL 77
Saturday, 02 . 24 . 07
6:30pm at Wall High School
________________________________________
__________
Rare pictures released! DODGEBALL 42, Diana's Dodgeball Dinner from last February, and more!
Check them out at
http://community.webshots.com/user/eastcoastdodgeball
!!
